Name: Star Tank
About the game: Star Tank is a shmup with eighties aesthetics, a mixture of styles (Galaga-Operation Wolf). A difficult game that requires great control skills. 20 stages. 5 bosses. Various enemies. Become an expert pilot of a StarTank!!!! *Arcade. *Retro. *Gamepad and Keyboard. *Vintage. *20 stages. *5 bosses.
